title: Painted Scars
description: NinaCharming, captivating, and seductive,And a cold-blooded killer.But I married the Pakhan of the Russian Bratva anyway.I had to. It was part of the deal.Now, I’m faking marital bliss,As I tremble with fear,And I cannot wait to be out of the clutches of this ruthless man.RomanI get anything I desire.And I want this perfectly imperfect little manipulator.The way she can deceive anyone into believing she’s crazy in love with me,Just makes me want her even more.She doesn't know it yet,But I am not letting her go.The deal - is off.*Painted Scars is a full-length novel with several open-door steamy scenes, no cheating and a guaranteed HEA.This is the first book in Perfectly Imperfect dark mafia series. Each book in this series features a different couple and can be read as a standalone, but for maximum enjoyment, follow the recommended reading order.
author: Neva Altaj
